::: {.about-intro-card}
## About Me

Hi, I'm **Zain**, a third-year **Applied Statistics** student at the **University of Toronto Mississauga**, with minors in **Computer Science** and **Mathematics**.  

I'm passionate about connecting **data, design, and storytelling** by using analysis and visualization to make information more human and useful.
:::

::: {.about-section-card}
### Current Work

I'm currently a **Software Engineer Intern** at **Wholeviz**, a data visualization platform helping NGOs, journalists, and public teams turn datasets into interactive dashboards. My work focuses on **React**, **Next.js**, **Tailwind**, and **Plotly**, where I design intuitive front-end interfaces and experiment with **AI-assisted data visualization** features.

Recently, I was selected for the **Skills for the Future Program** with **IBM SkillsBuild × Riipen**, collaborating with **Digital Placemaking Canada** on website redesign and data-driven dashboards.

My startup experience has taught me to be adaptable, communicate effectively across different teams, and deliver results in fast-paced environments.
:::

::: {.about-section-card}
### More About Me

Alongside my work, I'm completing the **IBM Data Analytics Professional Certificate** on Coursera and the **IBM SkillsBuild Digital Credential in User Experience Design Fundamentals**. Through these programs, I'm deepening my skills in **Excel, SQL, Python (Pandas)**, and **IBM Cognos Analytics**, while learning to bridge **analytical storytelling** with **UI and UX design thinking**.

Outside of code and coursework, I recharge through **volleyball**, **table tennis**, and long walks around Mississauga. I'm naturally curious about how things work, whether that's a dataset, a business model, or a React component, and I like turning that curiosity into projects that make data actually mean something.

**Get in touch:** [zain.ghias@mail.utoronto.ca](mailto:zain.ghias@mail.utoronto.ca)
:::

<script>
// Scroll-triggered card entrance + border animation
// Cards fade in and slide up first, then border fills down
(function() {
  'use strict';
  
  const cards = document.querySelectorAll('.about-intro-card, .about-section-card, .experience-card, .project-card');
  
  if (!('IntersectionObserver' in window)) {
    // Fallback: show all cards immediately
    cards.forEach(function(card) {
      card.classList.add('card-visible', 'border-animated');
    });
    return;
  }
  
  // Observer for card entrance animation
  const cardObserver = new IntersectionObserver(function(entries) {
    entries.forEach(function(entry) {
      if (entry.isIntersecting) {
        const card = entry.target;
        
        // Step 1: Make card visible (fade in + slide up)
        card.classList.add('card-visible');
        
        // Step 2: After card appears, trigger border animation
        setTimeout(function() {
          card.classList.add('border-animated');
        }, 300); // 300ms delay after card appears
        
        cardObserver.unobserve(card);
      }
    });
  }, {
    threshold: 0.2, // Trigger when 20% of card is visible
    rootMargin: '0px 0px -50px 0px' // Start animation slightly before card fully enters
  });
  
  // Observe all cards
  cards.forEach(function(card) {
    cardObserver.observe(card);
  });
})();

// Scroll-triggered progress bar animation
(function() {
  'use strict';
  
  if (!('IntersectionObserver' in window)) {
    document.querySelectorAll('.progress-bar').forEach(function(bar) {
      const progress = bar.getAttribute('data-progress');
      if (progress) {
        setTimeout(function() {
          bar.style.width = progress + '%';
        }, 100);
      }
    });
    return;
  }
  
  const progressObserver = new IntersectionObserver(function(entries) {
    entries.forEach(function(entry) {
      if (entry.isIntersecting) {
        const bar = entry.target;
        const progress = bar.getAttribute('data-progress');
        
        if (progress && !bar.classList.contains('animated')) {
          bar.classList.add('animated');
          setTimeout(function() {
            bar.style.width = progress + '%';
          }, 100);
        }
        
        progressObserver.unobserve(bar);
      }
    });
  }, {
    threshold: 0.3,
    rootMargin: '0px 0px -50px 0px'
  });
  
  document.querySelectorAll('.progress-bar').forEach(function(bar) {
    progressObserver.observe(bar);
  });
  
  const kpiObserver = new IntersectionObserver(function(entries) {
    entries.forEach(function(entry) {
      if (entry.isIntersecting) {
        entry.target.style.opacity = '1';
        entry.target.style.transform = 'translateY(0)';
        kpiObserver.unobserve(entry.target);
      }
    });
  }, {
    threshold: 0.2,
    rootMargin: '0px 0px -30px 0px'
  });
  
  document.querySelectorAll('.kpi-card').forEach(function(card, index) {
    card.style.opacity = '0';
    card.style.transform = 'translateY(20px)';
    card.style.transition = 'opacity 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.25, 0.46, 0.45, 0.94) ' + (index * 0.1) + 's, transform 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.25, 0.46, 0.45, 0.94) ' + (index * 0.1) + 's';
    kpiObserver.observe(card);
  });
})();

// Flip card functionality for experience cards
(function() {
  'use strict';
  
  // Wait for DOM to be ready
  function initFlipCards() {
    const experienceCards = document.querySelectorAll('.experience-card');
    
    if (experienceCards.length === 0) {
      // Retry if cards aren't loaded yet
      setTimeout(initFlipCards, 100);
      return;
    }
    
    experienceCards.forEach(function(card) {
      // Handle click/touch events
      function handleFlip(e) {
        // Prevent event bubbling
        e.stopPropagation();
        
        // Only allow flip after card is visible
        if (card.classList.contains('card-visible')) {
          card.classList.toggle('flipped');
          // Mark card as interacted to hide indicator
          card.classList.add('card-interacted');
        }
      }
      
      // Click event
      card.addEventListener('click', handleFlip);
      
      // Touch event for mobile (prevent double-tap zoom)
      let touchStartTime = 0;
      let touchStartX = 0;
      let touchStartY = 0;
      
      card.addEventListener('touchstart', function(e) {
        touchStartTime = Date.now();
        touchStartX = e.touches[0].clientX;
        touchStartY = e.touches[0].clientY;
      });
      
      card.addEventListener('touchend', function(e) {
        const touchDuration = Date.now() - touchStartTime;
        const touchEndX = e.changedTouches[0].clientX;
        const touchEndY = e.changedTouches[0].clientY;
        const deltaX = Math.abs(touchEndX - touchStartX);
        const deltaY = Math.abs(touchEndY - touchStartY);
        
        // Only flip on quick tap (not long press or swipe)
        if (touchDuration < 300 && deltaX < 10 && deltaY < 10) {
          e.preventDefault();
          handleFlip(e);
        }
      });
    });
  }
  
  // Initialize when DOM is ready
  if (document.readyState === 'loading') {
    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initFlipCards);
  } else {
    initFlipCards();
  }
})();

// Add lazy loading and loading state to profile image
(function() {
  'use strict';
  
  function initProfileImage() {
    const profileImage = document.querySelector('.about-image');
    
    if (!profileImage) {
      // Retry if image isn't loaded yet
      setTimeout(initProfileImage, 100);
      return;
    }
    
    // Add lazy loading attribute if not already present
    if (!profileImage.hasAttribute('loading')) {
      profileImage.setAttribute('loading', 'lazy');
    }
    
    // Mark as loaded once image finishes loading
    if (profileImage.complete) {
      profileImage.classList.add('loaded');
    } else {
      profileImage.addEventListener('load', function() {
        profileImage.classList.add('loaded');
      });
      
      // Fallback: mark as loaded after a timeout
      setTimeout(function() {
        profileImage.classList.add('loaded');
      }, 2000);
    }
  }
  
  // Initialize when DOM is ready
  if (document.readyState === 'loading') {
    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initProfileImage);
  } else {
    initProfileImage();
  }
})();
</script>
